alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Houston; Olmsted; Wabasha; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 2:24AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Winona, eastern Olmsted, Wabasha, Houston, Fillmore, Buffalo, western La Crosse, northwestern Vernon and Trempealeau Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 223 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Elgin, or 14 miles northeast of Rochester, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Buffalo, Buffalo City and Kellogg around 245 AM CDT. Alma around 250 AM CDT. Modena around 300 AM CDT. Strum around 320 AM CDT. Osseo around 330 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Forestville State Park, North Side Of La Crosse, Camp Decorah, South Side Of La Crosse, Potsdam, Isinours, Chimney Rock, Riceford, Highway 88 And County O and County Roads 28 And 31. People attending Preston, MN should seek safe shelter immediately! This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 between mile markers 88 and 91. Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 223 and 276. Interstate 90 in Wisconsin between mile markers 1 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
